title: Sample Project
description: This is a sample project using the penguins dataset from the `palmerpenguins` package
contents:
Load libraries


library(tidyverse)
library(palmerpenguins) # has penguin data
library(ggeasy) # has "helper" functions to use with ggplot



Get a preview of the data


head(penguins)


# A tibble: 6 x 8
  species island    bill_length_mm bill_depth_mm flipper_length_mm
  <fct>   <fct>              <dbl>         <dbl>             <int>
1 Adelie  Torgersen           39.1          18.7               181
2 Adelie  Torgersen           39.5          17.4               186
3 Adelie  Torgersen           40.3          18                 195
4 Adelie  Torgersen           NA            NA                  NA
5 Adelie  Torgersen           36.7          19.3               193
6 Adelie  Torgersen           39.3          20.6               190
# ... with 3 more variables: body_mass_g <int>, sex <fct>, year <int>

Research Question
What is the relationship between flipper length and bill length for the 3 penguin species?


ggplot(penguins, aes(bill_length_mm, flipper_length_mm, color=species)) +
  geom_point() +
  theme_bw() +
  labs(x = "Bill Length", y = "Flipper Length") +
  easy_text_size(15) # from ggeasy
